name: Winds of Change - The Opening Act
name_original: Winds of Change - The Opening Act
description:
Voice actors in Winds of Change are best known for performing in franchises such as:

  • The Legend of Zelda
  • Persona 5
  • Fairy Tail
  • Hunter x Hunter
  • Danganronpa
  • Zero Escape
  • Gundam
  • Mob Psycho 100
  • One Punch Man
  • One Piece
  • Secret of Mana
  • Fire Emblem
  • Re:ZERO
  • Dust: An Elysian Tail
